sermons.title: A Prepared Heart
sermons.description: You must seek the Lord with all your heart, prepared to listen to him, and prepared to follow his instructions in obedience and faith. As long as Rehoboam sought the Lord, he prospered and had peace. When he stopped seeking God, and began to do things his own way, the enemy came in and stole the treasures of God out of the temple. Believers are the temple of the Holy Ghost. Take careful heed to this message.
